name: Valerie
text: The property is all a little ways from the downtown so it was nice and quiet with surrounding farmland. The grounds are beautiful, our kids enjoyed the roaming peacocks and being able to pick fresh cherries off the tree across from our room. We stayed in one of the apartments and it was very spacious and clean for our family of four. The staff was always very friendly and the breakfast was very good! There is both indoor and outdoor swimming pool available, although we did not have time to use them, they looked nice. This property is European style, which was a nice break from all of the Moroccan style properties we had been staying in on our journey through Morocco. The cedar forest and monkeys are very close by. Would not hesitate to return and stay here again!

name: Iris
text: The rooms are nice with very nice view. The hotel has nice swimming pool (quite warm in the winter) and nice Hammam. We had to leave very early and the staff prepared us early breakfast Dinner at the hotel was good.

name: Hamza
text: I loved the warm pool. I loved the massage.

name: Skye
text: The indoor pool and the large balcony

name: Bert
text: Wellness Architecture Swimmingpool warm Restaurant Lounge

name: Dr
text: Very Cozy little lodge. Tastefully decorated like an English manor with local the famous Atlas Cedar wood & art craft. The food dining experience was absolutely delightful. The full course dinner menu was heavenly tasty. The apple pie was better than most gourmet pastry sold by landmarks like Le Notre, Chez Paul, etc. So was the home made croissants served in the fabulous breakfast. This is a great getaway for Canadian expats like me who miss the Eastern Townships and it’s beautiful country Inns. I would go back in winter when the snow is all over Azrou & Ifrane to try the Berber Spa. Kudos to the Master Chef & to the local staff. Sabrina & her Dad From Montreal, Canada

name: Lauren
text: Beautiful and comfortable, a perfect getaway. Loved the tennis court (there's only one court, but they have rackets and balls for you to use) the indoor pool is very relaxing. The food at the restaurant is delicious.

name: Khalifa
text: Clean good size room great view
